A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is terrible. So many plot holes\, it sinks to the bottom of my Star Wars totem pole. There were some good moments. But overall\, just a mess. Luke deserved better. This movie was so hyped and falls way short. Disney will no doubt try to defend this stinking turd of a movie. You have lost a fan. Mark Hamill ... your instincts were right ... this is not the movie most fans wanted to see
